table.name: report_log
table.description: The REPORT_LOG table contains log information about when a report was run, and the parameters that the report was run with.

columns.name: FILE_NAME
columns.description: Filename generated by the report program. For forms that need to be stored for each run a new filename will be generated. For operational reports where only the current run pdf file is needed, an update will be done with the same file name.

columns.name: REPORT_GID
columns.description: GC3 Global indetifier for the entity. Is created by concatenating Domain Name,'.' and XID.

columns.name: JOB_NUMBER
columns.description: Running sequence generated by the BN number generator

columns.name: GL_USER_GID
columns.description: GC3 Global indetifier for the entity. Is created by concatenating Domain Name,'.' and XID.

columns.name: RUN_DATE
columns.description: The date/time when the report was run

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Domain of the User. Is used for creating the GID.

columns.name: REPORT_SET_GID
columns.description: The report set that this report was run for (this can be null).

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the id of the user who first entered the record.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the date and time when the record was first entered in the database.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the id of the user who last updated the record.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the date and time when the record was updated in the database.

columns.name: BULK_REPORTING_GID
columns.description: If the report is part of a bulk report generation, the ID for monitoring
